name: root
description: A performant and modular ERC-4337 Bundler written in Typescript
author: Pimlico

scripts.build:contracts: cd contracts/ && forge build --evm-version london --out ../src/contracts/ src/v06/EntryPointCodeOverride.sol && forge build --evm-version london --out ../src/contracts/ src/v07/PimlicoEntryPointSimulationsV7.sol && forge build --evm-version cancun --out ../src/contracts/ src/v08/PimlicoEntryPointSimulationsV8.sol
scripts.dev: pnpm run build:contracts && nodemon --ext ts,js,json --watch src --exec DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=$(pwd)/.env ts-node --project src/tsconfig.json -r tsconfig-paths/register src/cli/alto.ts run
scripts.test:ci: pnpm run build:contracts && pnpm --filter e2e run test:ci
